entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to use the SDK inside and Xamarin/MAUI app? #35419
  • Linux issue [libhostpolicy.so] #35410
  • `dotnet restore` does not support `-f TFM` #35408
  • `dotnet build` doesn't works, even on a bare console project #35403
  • `MSBuild` Code Analysis formatting exception #35388
  • namespace declaration style not defined in editorconfig #35383
  • Solution dependency exe project outputs to main project directory with TargetFramework and not with TargetFrameworks #35379

Closed

  • The `/etc/paths.d/` directory and the `dotnet-cli-tools` file are global for all users. Writing the full path of a specific user in this file should not be done. #35417

PullRequests

Created

  • Metrics switch support in the SDK #35418
    area-runtime, untriaged, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #35412
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write the full path of the dotnet tools directory in /etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools #35411
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Find dotnet.exe from VS's MSBuild #35409
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35407
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #35401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #35400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include APICompat resources #35398
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #35402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35382
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update NuGet certificate thumbprints #35380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix package version in Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #35309
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [8.0.1xx] Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35371
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #35324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add escape hatch for PublishAot without RuntimeIdentifier. Fixes #33414. #35366
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add `.mono` to `.gitingore` #35343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template #35268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
